content:
we'll have another meeting in an hour, right?
asking because i have not heard anything yet and last meeting was 2 weeks ago
Yes. exactly. Today's agenda will be triage (as always) and roadmap project assignments
might be good to have some kind of heads-up 24 hours before so people don't forget (like me, almost.. :sweat_smile: )
Good point. I will put up a meeting placeholder thread next time the day before. :+1:
yeah, I think that worked out quite well for the other teams :)
